entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 31 March 2023
